dirgha kalayak akhanda wa pawathi mema sanga parapura mathakalina wa pelagasma mese ya. 1741 mahanuwara yugaye undupitiye silwathun wahanse, 1757 rajaguru wagegoda indrasara na himi, 1791 murungasyaye shri swarnajothi na himi, 1805 wagegoda rewatha ma himi, 1839 bambaarande dewananda ma himi, 1857 middeniye sangharakkhitha na himi, 1868 kohomporuwe sumangala na himi, 1888 wagegoda shri sumangala na himi (maha wihara wanshika shyamopali maha nikaye malwathu wihara parshawaye mathara wallabadapaththuwa athulu wa hambanthota palathe pradhana sanghanayaka shri saddharma wagishwaracharya mahopadhyaya dhurandara), 1915 murungasyaye sarananda ma himi (bharakara wiharadhipathi), 1958 murungasyaye piyarathana ma himi (bharakara wiharadhipathi), 1960 naradde siri pemasiri ma himi, 1969 beligalle mahinda na himi, 1970 aluthwawamulana piyathissa ma himi (bharakara wiharadhipathi), 1989 dambaaralla wanarathana na himi.........
